sentences.en: Any school trip requires careful planning.
sentences.cn: 学校的任何出游活动都需要周密的安排。

sentences.en: He walked towards the doorway, careful to keep his distance.
sentences.cn: 他走向门口，小心翼翼地保持着距离。

sentences.en: He was being very careful with the coffee so as not to spill it.
sentences.cn: 他非常小心地拿着咖啡，以免泼出来。

sentences.en: He was careful and diligent. I was all over the place.
sentences.cn: 他细心且勤奋，我则稀里糊涂。

sentences.en: I asked her to be more careful in future.
sentences.cn: 我要她以后要更加小心。

sentences.en: I made a silent vow to be more careful in the future.
sentences.cn: 我暗暗发誓，日后要倍加小心。

sentences.en: If you are not careful, children tend to neglect their homework.
sentences.cn: 如果你不注意的话，孩子们往往会不重视他们的家庭作业。

sentences.en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
sentences.cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

sentences.en: It would force industries to be more careful with natural resources.
sentences.cn: 这将迫使企业更加节约资源。

sentences.en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
sentences.cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

sentences.en: Politicians are usually careful not to ruffle the feathers of their constituents.
sentences.cn: 政治家们通常都很小心，避免激怒了他们的选民。

sentences.en: She kissed me, careful not to smudge me with her fresh lipstick.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地吻了我，以免把刚刚抹上的口红弄到我脸上。

sentences.en: This very careful attitude to money can sometimes border on meanness.
sentences.cn: 这种对待金钱的过分谨慎的态度有时几近于吝啬。

sentences.en: Those in his employ were careful never to enrage him.
sentences.cn: 在他手底下干活的人都非常小心绝不去触怒他。

sentences.en: We begin to reproach ourselves for not having been more careful.
sentences.cn: 我们开始自责起来，怪自己不够小心。

sentences.en: You can't be too careful when a young child is near water.
sentences.cn: 孩子在水边时，还是越小心越好。

sentences.en: You have to be careful what you say on telly.
sentences.cn: 在电视上说话时你必须很谨慎。

words.tran_cn: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的
有同情心的；表示或感到关怀或关心的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地

trans.tran_cn: 小心的，仔细的，谨慎的，节约的
trans.tran_en: paying a lot of attention to details, so that something is done correctly and thoroughly
